summary: This document is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Expedia Group, dated January 24, 2020, commanding the production of all records related to flights purchased, booked, or taken by Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes a cover letter requesting non-disclosure to preserve the confidentiality of the ongoing criminal investigation and a declaration form for a custodian of records.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued and signed the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena specifically requests all flight records for Ghislaine Maxwell from Expedia Group as part of a grand jury investigation into alleged violations of federal criminal law.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance Date for Expedia
events.description: The subpoena commands Expedia Group to appear before the grand jury on this date to testify and produce records, though a personal appearance is waived if records are produced to the FBI by that date.

events.title: Issuance of Grand Jury Subpoena to Expedia
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office issued a grand jury subpoena to Expedia Group as part of an official criminal investigation into a suspected felony, specifically requesting flight records for Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: U.S. Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, NY
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell as of January 2020, using a grand jury subpoena to obtain her flight records from Expedia.
The investigation involved alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. ยง 2423(a), which relates to transportation of minors for illegal sexual activity.
The government explicitly requested Expedia not to disclose the existence of the subpoena to any third party to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The subpoena was issued shortly before Maxwell's arrest in July 2020, indicating the advanced stage of the investigation into her activities.
